query.name: Mutagen_Allele
query.view: Gene.alleles.primaryIdentifier Gene.alleles.secondaryIdentifier Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.alleles.mutagens.description Gene.alleles.dataSets.dataSource.name
query.longDescription: Find all D. melanogaster gene alleles created in a certain way. Give the corresponding gene for the allele. (Data Source: FlyBase).
